dynamic_line: I wish there was more time for you to have trained, but extraordinary times call for extraordinary measures.  You must save June O'Fanny from certain death.

responses.text: Do you have any advice for the [MISSION] ?

yes: Don't start any trouble marshal, you aren't the law anymore.
no: Do you need any more help?

responses.text: Can you tell me about my first [MISSION] again?

dynamic_line: June O'Fanny has sent me a message saying that she is trapped in the panic room on the top floor of the Channel 4 News Building.  She tells me that the building has been attacked by a powerful force of Xenoid aliens.  She doesn't have any food or water in that room so if you fail to save her, she has vital informationt that could help turn the tide in this, cataclysm.  Do you have any questions or are you ready to go?

responses.text: What is the best way to get to her?

dynamic_line: Well the Channel 4 News Building is built directly above the inner sanctum here, so you don't have far to go.  The parking garage is connected to the larger sewer system.  Once you get in the basement parking garage its easy enough to climb up the elevator shaft to the roof of the building.
